comment: REVEL homework was decent. It reinforces what will be on the tests. The tests were sometimes confusing because some of the answer choices sound so much alike, but only one answer choice could be correct.

She was enjoyable and helped the class go faster. Provides good common sense situations but provides vague PPTS with info straight from the textbook (lectures are not as necessary). Tests are ALL vocab straight from the textbook (READ THE BOOK TO PASS). DO NOT rely on what she says will be on the test, just read the book!

Shes not terrible, the class was very straight forward for the most part. Her personality takes some getting used to. Sometimes tests will have a few odd questions, but if you study the vocab youll be fine. Had a total of 5 group assignments that were easy. The final exam wasnt cumulative so that was a plus. Study the vocabulary!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria--GROUP PROJECTS

comment: For a Human Communication class, it was supposed to be an easy A... especially if I am an engineer major. More work and studying had to be put in this class, more than usual, in order to keep an Few tips: Avoid studying only what she says "will be on the test", just study notes straight from the Revel textbook. Powerpoint are not helpful.

She's a great person with high energy and I enjoyed listening to her. But the tests were nothing like the class. The class was laid back and common sense where as the tests were conceptual and interpretive, no matter how much I studied I couldn't get higher than a B on the tests. Show up to class and do all the work and you'll get a B.

Absolutely do not take for ANY course.  Terrible teacher.  Does not prepare you for tests or even the homework.  The material she teaches in class has ZERO relevance to the test or homework.  Stay clear of this professor.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--TEST HEAVY

comment: At the beginning of the semester, she assigned us groups, and these groups were the people we sat with and did group work with all semester, so don't worry about the group stuff. Every class she lectures off of PowerPoints, but she manages to make them interesting. She can talk to herself at times, so try to sit in the front. Definitely recommend
Very good overall teacher. Tests are a little hard, study and you'll pass the test. All tests are online in class.

I had her for an 8am but she made the class enjoyable. She's so sweet and funny and enjoys what she teaches. She Posts powerpoints online and the tests are soooo easy. She doesnt try to trick you on any of the questions. One major GROUP project but nothing too bad. Love her! Would recommend!

Don't expect it to be common sense. She is really funny and interesting to listen to, however, the test were kinda insane. Like I consider myself pretty knowledgeable in communicating since I do it everyday, but I only made an A on one of the test and didn't skip any classes. Do well on the group project, go to class and a B should be manageable.

She is a BLAST! I had her as an 8am and she had me laughing and actually paying attetion. It's nice to see a teacher with good morals, but still outgoing and funny as ever. She makes sure to keep eye contact and make you feel good while you are up speaking in front of the class. Just breath and keep eye contact and a loud enouigh speaking voice!

This Class is very cool. There is a huge group project that is pretty much a solo project. You have to speak in front of the class for 5-7 minutes. not hard at all. She doesn't really give work. You have three tests, that presentation and a workbook that you use here and there. This is a great class. I liked it a lot.

Show up or don't. Attendance is taking every class by students. She is super understanding and personable. You are put in groups on day one but everyone has to do their part.  DONT BUY THE TEXT BOOK!!!! You need the workbook every day you are in class.  Mostly watched movies and filled out workbook pages after.  LOVE LOVE LOVE HER!!!

Great teacher! You WILL need to buy the workbook for her class but the textbook is not useful. All of her tests come straight from the study guides. As long as you go to class and do the worksheets, you will make an A. However, if you do not do the easy worksheets in class, you'll lose major points. HIGHLY RECOMMEND! EASY A AND GPA BOOSTER!!!

Her personality makes her lectures interesting.  5 assignments for the semester make up your final grade, Workbook , Test 1, Test 2, Group Project and Final Exam. Attendance is taken daily. Tests are mostly True False.  Good professor but I would not take her again.

She puts you in groups the very first day. You take roll everyday and do a workbook page almost every time, for a grade. The tests are a lot harder than you would expect because she goes over the powerpoint but doesn't linger on explaining them - which makes studying for the tests a MUST.  Not very easy for a Gen Ed course.

One of the best teachers I've ever had. Theres a big group project that is a lot of work. I had major issues in my group and she was SOOOO helpful and understanding. SHE WILL HELP YOU IF YOU TALK TO HER. Great lectures. Super easy to understand. Her study guides are the test. Super nice. TAKE HER CLASS

The participation project wasn't bad, takes roughly an hour because you have about 8 ppl to each group. Workbook assignments every class. The tests are tough, know the material. Puts power points up for each chapter on d2l. She's quirky, but in a good way and has an amazing personality, class was always interesting. Tests are online in class

She gave us a chance for extra credit as a group. Kinda funny, easy book work, test questions a bit tricky but overall i would recommend her to anyone that wants to be active in their learning. I can agree with everyone else with the project being over the top.
She's really nice but she grades so hard.  She follows the rubric word for word. The final is a joke.  I somehow pulled off a B.

Some days she was ok and some days she didn't seem like she was there.  Did a group presentation that had to last almost an hour!!!! TOO MUCH FOR A beginning communications class! We did more in this class than a higher level com class! BEWARE if you do take her!
No Comments

Love her!  Energetic, fun, makes some tedious information very enjoyable.  Keeps class lively - discussions are interesting.  Lectures are clear and there are no surprises on any tests or assignments.  Would take another class with her in a heartbeat!

She is easily the worst professor i have ever had. She covers content that is self explanitory in such a way that makes you confused about normal everyday activities. She has actually made me less intelligent, and i have only been in there for a few weeks. Take her if you like to suck up, because if your like me and youdont then goodluck withgrades

She was very funny and informative and pretty willing to help you out.  If she was in a bad mood though, while rare, you didn't really want to be there.  She kept the class fun and no secrets about your grade.
She is THE BEST.  The content is interesting and she is funny, fair and helpful.  I looked forward to coming to class!!!!!
